attributes.action: remove and melt down the recently installed statue of Margaret Thatcher and use the funds to increase the pay of our hard-working NHS nurses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Much of the self-centred obsession with 'rights' which is destroying our country, stems from the actions of Margaret Thatcher, whilst our essential services are being starved of resources. It is hypocritical to remember her in a positive light when nurses have been offered a pay rise lower than inflation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
